trans-unit.source: Constructs a new runtime exception with the specified cause and a detail message of (cause==null ? null : cause.toString()) (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause). This constructor is useful for runtime exceptions that are little more than wrappers for other throwables.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的运行时异常，并带有指定的cause和详细信息 (cause==null ? null : cause.toString()) （通常包含 cause 的类和详细信息）。此构造函数对运行时异常有用，该异常仅比其他throwable的包装好。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new runtime exception with the specified detail message, cause, suppression enabled or disabled, and writable stack trace enabled or disabled.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new runtime exception with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to Throwable.initCause(java.lang.Throwable).
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细信息构造一个新的运行时异常。原因尚未初始化，并且随后可以通过调用 Throwable.initCause(java.lang.Throwable) 进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new set containing the elements in the specified collection, that orders its elements according to their natural ordering.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个包含指定集合中元素的新集合，该集合根据其自然顺序对元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new set containing the elements in the specified collection. The HashMap is created with default load factor (0.75) and an initial capacity sufficient to contain the elements in the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新集合，其中包含指定集合中的元素。在 HashMap 中与默认负载因数（0.75）和初始容量足以容纳指定的集合中的元素创建的。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new set containing the same elements and using the same ordering as the specified sorted set.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的集合,包含相同的元素,并使用与指定的排序集合相同的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new thread group. The parent of this new group is the thread group of the currently running thread.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的线程组。新线程组的父线是当前运行的线程的线程组。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new throwable with null as its detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause(java.lang.Throwable).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的throwable，并将其 null 作为其详细信息。原因尚未初始化，并且随后可以通过调用 initCause(java.lang.Throwable) 进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new throwable with the specified cause and a detail message of (cause==null ? null : cause.toString()) (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause). This constructor is useful for throwables that are little more than wrappers for other throwables (for example, PrivilegedActionException).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个具有指定的cause和详细信息 (cause==null ? null : cause.toString()) 的新throwable （通常包含 cause 的类和详细信息）。此构造函数对仅用于其他可包装对象的包装器（例如 PrivilegedActionException ）的可包装对象很有用。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new throwable with the specified detail message and cause.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的细节信息和原因构造一个新的可抛物。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new throwable with the specified detail message, cause, suppression enabled or disabled, and writable stack trace enabled or disabled. If suppression is disabled, getSuppressed() for this object will return a zero-length array and calls to addSuppressed(java.lang.Throwable) that would otherwise append an exception to the suppressed list will have no effect. If the writable stack trace is false, this constructor will not call fillInStackTrace(), a null will be written to the stackTrace field, and subsequent calls to fillInStackTrace and setStackTrace(StackTraceElement[]) will not set the stack trace. If the writable stack trace is false, getStackTrace() will return a zero length array.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造新的throwable，启用或禁用原因，抑制，以及启用或禁用可写堆栈跟踪。如果禁用了抑制，则此对象的 getSuppressed() 将返回零长度的数组，并调用 addSuppressed(java.lang.Throwable) ，否则将异常添加到抑制列表中将无效。如果可写堆栈跟踪为false，则此构造方法将不会调用 fillInStackTrace() ，将 null 写入 stackTrace 字段，并随后调用 fillInStackTrace 和 setStackTrace(StackTraceElement[]) 不会设置堆栈跟踪。如果可写堆栈跟踪为false，则 getStackTrace() 将返回长度为零的数组。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new throwable with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause(java.lang.Throwable).
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细信息构造一个新的throwable。原因尚未初始化，并且随后可以通过调用 initCause(java.lang.Throwable) 进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new tree map containing the same mappings and using the same ordering as the specified sorted map. This method runs in linear time.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的树状图,包含相同的映射,并使用与指定的排序图相同的排序。此方法以线性时间运行。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new tree map containing the same mappings as the given map, ordered according to the natural ordering of its keys. All keys inserted into the new map must implement the Comparable interface. Furthermore, all such keys must be mutually comparable: k1.compareTo(k2) must not throw a ClassCastException for any keys k1 and k2 in the map. This method runs in n*log(n) time.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新树图，该树图包含与给定图相同的映射，并根据其键的自然顺序进行排序。插入到新映射中的所有键都必须实现 Comparable 接口。此外，所有此类键必须相互可比较： k1.compareTo(k2) 不得为映射中的任何键 k1 和 k2 抛出 ClassCastException 。此方法以n * log（n）时间运行。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new tree set containing the elements in the specified collection, sorted according to the
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的树集,其中包含指定集合中的元素,并根据树集中的内容进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new tree set containing the same elements and using the same ordering as the specified sorted set.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的树集,包含相同的元素,并使用与指定的排序集相同的排序。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty WeakHashMap with the default initial capacity (16) and load factor (0.75).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空 WeakHashMap ，其默认初始容量（16）和负载因子（0.75）。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty WeakHashMap with the given initial capacity and the default load factor (0.75).
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的初始容量和默认负载因子（0.75）构造一个新的空 WeakHashMap 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty WeakHashMap with the given initial capacity and the given load factor.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的初始容量和给定的负载因子构造一个新的空 WeakHashMap 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty Attributes object with default size.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的、空的、默认大小的Attributes对象。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty Attributes object with the specified initial size.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的初始大小构造一个新的空的Attributes对象。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty Manifest.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的、空的Manifest。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty hashtable with a default initial capacity (11) and load factor (0.75).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空的哈希特表,默认初始容量(11)和负载系数(0.75)。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty hashtable with the specified initial capacity and default load factor (0.75).
trans-unit.target: 用指定的初始容量和默认的负载系数(0.75)构建一个新的空的哈希特表。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty hashtable with the specified initial capacity and the specified load factor.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的初始容量和指定的负载系数构造一个新的空的哈希特表。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty identity hash map with a default expected maximum size (21).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的、空的身份哈希图,默认为最大尺寸(21)。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty linked hash set with the default initial capacity (16) and load factor (0.75).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的、空的链接哈希集,默认初始容量(16)和负载因子(0.75)。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty linked hash set with the specified initial capacity and load factor.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的初始容量和负载系数构造一个新的空链接哈希集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty linked hash set with the specified initial capacity and the default load factor (0.75).
trans-unit.target: 用指定的初始容量和默认的负载系数(0.75)构建一个新的空链接哈希集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty map with the specified expected maximum size. Putting more than the expected number of key-value mappings into the map may cause the internal data structure to grow, which may be somewhat time-consuming.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的、空的、具有指定的预期最大尺寸的地图。将超过预期数量的键值映射放入地图中可能会导致内部数据结构的增长,这可能会有些耗时。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty map, sorted according to the natural ordering of the keys.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空映射，该映射根据键的自然顺序排序。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty map, sorted according to the specified comparator.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空地图,根据指定的比较器进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty set that orders its elements according to the specified comparator.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空集合,根据指定的比较器对其元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty set that orders its elements according to their natural ordering.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空集合，该集合根据元素的自然顺序对其进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty set; the backing HashMap instance has default initial capacity (16) and load factor (0.75).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空集；支持的 HashMap 实例具有默认的初始容量（16）和负载因子（0.75）。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty set; the backing HashMap instance has the specified initial capacity and default load factor (0.75).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空集；支持的 HashMap 实例具有指定的初始容量和默认负载因子（0.75）。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty set; the backing HashMap instance has the specified initial capacity and the specified load factor.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空集；支持的 HashMap 实例具有指定的初始容量和指定的负载系数。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty tree map, ordered according to the given comparator. All keys inserted into the map must be mutually comparable by the given comparator: comparator.compare(k1, k2) must not throw a ClassCastException for any keys k1 and k2 in the map. If the user attempts to put a key into the map that violates this constraint, the put(Object key, Object value) call will throw a ClassCastException.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空树图，根据给定的比较器排序。给定比较器必须将插入映射中的所有键相互比较： comparator.compare(k1, k2) 不得针对映射中的任何键 k1 和 k2 抛出 ClassCastException 。如果用户尝试将违反此约束的键放入映射，则 put(Object key, Object value) 调用将引发 ClassCastException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty tree map, using the natural ordering of its keys. All keys inserted into the map must implement the Comparable interface. Furthermore, all such keys must be mutually comparable: k1.compareTo(k2) must not throw a ClassCastException for any keys k1 and k2 in the map. If the user attempts to put a key into the map that violates this constraint (for example, the user attempts to put a string key into a map whose keys are integers), the put(Object key, Object value) call will throw a ClassCastException.
trans-unit.target: 使用其键的自然顺序构造一个新的空树形图。插入映射中的所有键都必须实现 Comparable 接口。此外，所有这些键必须相互可比较： k1.compareTo(k2) 不得为映射中的任何键 k1 和 k2 抛出 ClassCastException 。如果用户尝试将违反此约束的键放入映射（例如，用户尝试将键放入整数为键的映射中），则 put(Object key, Object value) 调用将引发 ClassCastException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty tree set, sorted according to the natural ordering of its elements. All elements inserted into the set must implement the Comparable interface. Furthermore, all such elements must be
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空树集，并根据其元素的自然顺序对其进行排序。插入到集合中的所有元素必须实现 Comparable 接口。此外，所有这些元素必须

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new, empty tree set, sorted according to the specified comparator. All elements inserted into the set must be
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新的空树集,根据指定的比较器进行排序。所有插入到树集中的元素必须是

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newline number input stream that reads its input from the specified input stream.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新行数输入流,从指定的输入流中读取其输入。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Byte object that represents the byte value indicated by the String parameter. The string is converted to a byte value in exactly the manner used by the parseByte method for radix 10.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Byte 对象，该对象表示 String 参数指示的 byte 值。完全按照 parseByte 方法用于基数10 的方式将字符串转换为 byte 值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Byte object that represents the specified byte value.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Byte 对象，该对象表示指定的 byte 值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Character object that represents the specified char value.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Character 对象，该对象表示指定的 char 值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Double object that represents the floating-point value of type double represented by the string. The string is converted to a double value as if by the valueOf method.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Double 对象，该对象表示由字符串表示的 double 类型的浮点值。就像使用 valueOf 方法一样，该字符串将转换为 double 精度值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Double object that represents the primitive double argument.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Double 对象，该对象表示原始 double 参数。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Float object that represents the argument converted to type float.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Float 对象，该对象表示转换为 float 类型的参数。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Float object that represents the floating-point value of type float represented by the string. The string is converted to a float value as if by the valueOf method.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Float 对象，该对象表示由字符串表示的 float 类型的浮点值。就像使用 valueOf 方法一样，该字符串将转换为 float 值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Float object that represents the primitive float argument.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Float 对象，该对象表示原始 float 参数。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Integer object that represents the int value indicated by the String parameter. The string is converted to an int value in exactly the manner used by the parseInt method for radix 10.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Integer 对象，该对象表示 String 参数指示的 int 值。完全按照 parseInt 方法用于基数10 的方式将字符串转换为 int 值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Integer object that represents the specified int value.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Integer 对象，该对象表示指定的 int 值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Long object that represents the long value indicated by the String parameter. The string is converted to a long value in exactly the manner used by the parseLong method for radix 10.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Long 对象，该对象表示 String 参数指示的 long 值。完全按照 parseLong 方法用于基数10 的方式将字符串转换为 long 值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Long object that represents the specified long argument.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Long 对象，该对象表示指定的 long 参数。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Short object that represents the short value indicated by the String parameter. The string is converted to a short value in exactly the manner used by the parseShort method for radix 10.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Short 对象，该对象表示 String 参数指示的 short 值。完全按照 parseShort 方法用于基数10 的方式将字符串转换为 short 值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a newly allocated Short object that represents the specified short value.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新分配的 Short 对象，该对象表示指定的 short 值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a non-critical control.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个非关键性控制。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a notification query result.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个通知查询结果。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a paged-results response control.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个分页结果响应控件。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for Diffie-Hellman, using a prime modulus p and a base generator g.
trans-unit.target: 使用质数模数 p 和基数生成器 g 构造Diffie-Hellman的参数集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for Diffie-Hellman, using a prime modulus p, a base generator g, and the size in bits, l, of the random exponent (private value).
trans-unit.target: 使用质数模数 p ，基数生成器 g 和随机指数（私有值）的以比特为单位的大小 l 构造Diffie-Hellman的参数集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for OAEP padding as defined in the PKCS #1 standard using the specified message digest algorithm mdName, mask generation function algorithm mgfName, parameters for the mask generation function mgfSpec, and source of the encoding input P pSrc.
trans-unit.target: 构建体使用指定的消息摘要算法在PKCS＃1标准中定义的OAEP冗余参数集 mdName ，掩码生成函数算法 mgfName ，掩码生成函数参数 mgfSpec ，并编码输入P的源 pSrc 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for RC2 from the given effective key size (in bits) and IV.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的有效密钥大小(以位为单位)和IV构建RC2的参数集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for RC2 from the given effective key size (in bits) and an 8-byte IV.
trans-unit.target: 从给定的有效密钥大小(位)和一个8字节的IV构建RC2的参数集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for RC2 from the given effective key size (in bits).
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的有效密钥大小(位)构建RC2的参数集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for RC5 from the given version, number of rounds and word size (in bits).
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的版本、轮数和字数(以比特为单位)为RC5构建一个参数集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for RC5 from the given version, number of rounds, word size (in bits), and IV.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的版本、轮数、字数(以位为单位)和IV,构建RC5的参数集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for mask generation function MGF1 as defined in the PKCS #1 standard.
trans-unit.target: 构造PKCS #1标准中定义的掩码生成函数MGF1的参数集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for password-based encryption as defined in the PKCS #5 standard.
trans-unit.target: 构建PKCS #5标准中定义的基于密码的加密的参数集。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a parameter set for the generation of Diffie-Hellman (system) parameters. The constructed parameter set can be used to initialize an AlgorithmParameterGenerator object for the generation of Diffie-Hellman parameters.
trans-unit.target: 构造用于生成Diffie-Hellman（系统）参数的参数集。构造的参数集可用于初始化 AlgorithmParameterGenerator 对象，以生成Diffie-Hellman参数。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a permission with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的名称构造一个权限。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a port's info object from the information given. This constructor is typically used by an implementation of Java Sound to describe a supported line.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的信息构造 port 的 info 对象。这个构造函数通常被 Java Sound 的实现用来描述支持的行。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a process builder with the specified operating system program and arguments. This constructor does
trans-unit.target: 用指定的操作系统程序和参数构造一个进程生成器。此构造函数不

trans-unit.source: Constructs a process builder with the specified operating system program and arguments. This is a convenience constructor that sets the process builder's command to a string list containing the same strings as the command array, in the same order. It is not checked whether command corresponds to a valid operating system command.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的操作系统程序和参数构造一个流程生成器。这是一个便利的构造函数，用于将流程生成器的命令设置为包含与 command 数组相同的字符串的字符串列表，并且顺序相同。不检查 command 是否对应于有效的操作系统命令。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a prototypical Event.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个原型事件。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a provider with the specified name, version number, and information.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的名称、版本号和信息构造一个提供者。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a quantization table from the argument, which must contain 64 elements in natural order (not zig-zag order). A copy is made of the the input array.
trans-unit.target: 从参数中构建一个量化表,该表必须包含64个自然顺序的元素(不是曲折顺序)。输入数组的副本。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a randomly generated BigInteger, uniformly distributed over the range 0 to (2numBits - 1), inclusive. The uniformity of the distribution assumes that a fair source of random bits is provided in rnd. Note that this constructor always constructs a non-negative BigInteger.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个随机生成的BigInteger，它均匀地分布在0到（2 numBits -1）（包括0和2 ）之间。分布的均匀性假定 rnd 中提供了公平的随机位源。请注意，此构造函数始终构造一个非负的BigInteger。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a randomly generated positive BigInteger that is probably prime, with the specified bitLength.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个随机生成的BigInteger,这个BigInteger可能是质数,并具有指定的bitLength。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a reader that decodes bytes from the given channel according to the named charset.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个读取器,根据命名的charset解码给定通道的字节。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a reader that decodes bytes from the given channel using the given decoder.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个读取器,使用给定的解码器对给定通道的字节进行解码。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a relative path between this path and a given path.
trans-unit.target: 在此路径和给定路径之间构造一个相对路径。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a search constraints using arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用参数构建一个搜索约束条件。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a search constraints using defaults.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认值构建搜索约束条件。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a search result using the result's name, its bound object, and its attributes, and whether the name is relative.
trans-unit.target: 使用结果的名称、绑定对象、属性以及名称是否是相对的,来构造搜索结果。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a search result using the result's name, its bound object, and its attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用搜索结果的名称、绑定对象及其属性构造搜索结果。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a search result using the result's name, its class name, its bound object, and its attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用结果的名称、类名、绑定对象和属性来构造搜索结果。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a search result using the result's name, its class name, its bound object, its attributes, and whether the name is relative.
trans-unit.target: 使用结果的名称、类名、绑定对象、属性以及名称是否是相对的来构造搜索结果。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a secret key from the given byte array, using the first len bytes of key, starting at offset inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的字节数组的秘密密钥，使用所述第一 len 的字节 key ，起始于 offset 的包容性。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a secret key from the given byte array.
trans-unit.target: 从给定的字节数组中构造一个秘密密钥。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a secure random number generator (RNG) implementing the default random number algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个安全的随机数生成器(RNG),实现默认的随机数算法。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a secure random number generator (RNG) implementing the default random number algorithm. The SecureRandom instance is seeded with the specified seed bytes.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个安全的随机数生成器(RNG),实现默认的随机数算法。SecureRandom实例是用指定的种子字节作为种子。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a sorted map from canonical charset names to charset objects.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个从规范字符集名称到字符集对象的排序映射。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a source of the encoding input P for OAEP padding as defined in the PKCS #1 standard using the specified PSource algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的PSource算法,构造一个用于OAEP填充的编码输入P的源,该源定义在PKCS #1标准中。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a stream that reads bytes from the given channel.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个从给定通道读取字节的流。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a stream that writes bytes to the given channel.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个向指定通道写入字节的流。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string buffer initialized to the contents of the specified string. The initial capacity of the string buffer is 16 plus the length of the string argument.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个初始化为指定字符串内容的字符串缓冲区。字符串缓冲区的初始容量为 16 加上字符串参数的长度。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string buffer that contains the same characters as the specified CharSequence. The initial capacity of the string buffer is 16 plus the length of the CharSequence argument.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个字符串缓冲区，其中包含与指定 CharSequence 相同的字符。字符串缓冲区的初始容量为 16 加上 CharSequence 参数的长度。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string buffer with no characters in it and an initial capacity of 16 characters.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有字符的字符串缓冲区,初始容量为16个字符。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string buffer with no characters in it and the specified initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有字符的字符串缓冲区,并指定初始容量。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string builder initialized to the contents of the specified string. The initial capacity of the string builder is 16 plus the length of the string argument.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个字符串构建器，初始化为指定字符串的内容。字符串生成器的初始容量为 16 加上字符串参数的长度。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string builder that contains the same characters as the specified CharSequence. The initial capacity of the string builder is 16 plus the length of the CharSequence argument.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个字符串构建器，其中包含与指定 CharSequence 相同的字符。字符串生成器的初始容量为 16 加上 CharSequence 参数的长度。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string builder with no characters in it and an initial capacity of 16 characters.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有字符的字符串生成器,初始容量为16个字符。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string builder with no characters in it and an initial capacity specified by the capacity argument.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个字符串构建器，其中不包含任何字符，并且初始容量由 capacity 参数指定。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string describing this object.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个描述此对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string representation of this URL. The string is created by calling the toExternalForm method of the stream protocol handler for this object.
trans-unit.target: 构造此 URL 的字符串表示形式。通过调用此对象的流协议处理程序的 toExternalForm 方法创建该字符串。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string representation of this InetSocketAddress. This String is constructed by calling toString() on the InetAddress and concatenating the port number (with a colon). If the address is unresolved then the part before the colon will only contain the hostname.
trans-unit.target: 构造此 InetSocketAddress 的字符串表示。该字符串是通过调用InetAddress上的toString()并连接端口号(用冒号)来构造的。如果地址是未解析的,那么冒号之前的部分将只包含主机名。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string representation of this Proxy. This String is constructed by calling toString() on its type and concatenating " @ " and the toString() result from its address if its type is not DIRECT.
trans-unit.target: 构造此代理的字符串表示形式。通过在其类型上调用toString（）并连接“ @”来构造此String，如果其类型不是 DIRECT ，则toString（）将从其地址得出结果。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string tokenizer for the specified string. All characters in the delim argument are the delimiters for separating tokens.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的字符串构造一个字符串标记器。 delim 参数中的所有字符都是用于分隔标记的定界符。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string tokenizer for the specified string. The characters in the delim argument are the delimiters for separating tokens. Delimiter characters themselves will not be treated as tokens.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的字符串构造一个字符串标记器。 delim 参数中的字符是用于分隔标记的定界符。分隔符本身不会被视为标记。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a string tokenizer for the specified string. The tokenizer uses the default delimiter set, which is " \t\n\r\f": the space character, the tab character, the newline character, the carriage-return character, and the form-feed character. Delimiter characters themselves will not be treated as tokens.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的字符串构造一个字符串标记器。分词器使用默认的定界符集 " \t\n\r\f" ：空格字符，制表符，换行符，回车符和换页符。分隔符本身不会被视为标记。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a synchronization mode.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个同步模式。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a unidimensional ArrayType instance for the supplied SimpleType.
trans-unit.target: 为提供的 SimpleType 构造一维 ArrayType 实例。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a vector containing the elements of the specified collection, in the order they are returned by the collection's iterator.
trans-unit.target: 按照集合迭代器返回的顺序,构造一个包含指定集合元素的向量。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a writer that encodes characters according to the named charset and writes the resulting bytes to the given channel.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个根据命名的charset编码字符的写入器,并将结果的字节写入给定的通道。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a writer that encodes characters using the given encoder and writes the resulting bytes to the given channel.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个写入器,使用给定的编码器对字符进行编码,并将产生的字节写入给定的通道。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an (invalid) FileDescriptor object.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个(无效的)FileDescriptor对象。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AclEntry from the components of this builder. The type and who components are required to have been set in order to construct an AclEntry.
trans-unit.target: 从此构建器的组件构造一个 AclEntry 。必须设置类型和谁组件才能构造 AclEntry 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AbstractMethodError with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细信息的 AbstractMethodError 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AbstractMethodError with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 AbstractMethodError 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AccessControlException with the specified, detailed message, and the requested permission that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息以及导致异常的请求权限构造一个 AccessControlException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AccessControlException with the specified, detailed message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 AccessControlException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ArithmeticException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细消息的 ArithmeticException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ArithmeticException with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 ArithmeticException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException class with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException 类。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细信息的 ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ArrayStoreException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细信息的 ArrayStoreException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ArrayStoreException with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 ArrayStoreException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ArrayType instance describing
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 ArrayType 实例，描述

trans-unit.source: Constructs an Attribute with the given name.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定名称构造一个 Attribute 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AttributeList containing the elements of the AttributeList specified, in the order in which they are returned by the AttributeList's iterator. The AttributeList instance has an initial capacity of 110% of the size of the AttributeList specified.
trans-unit.target: 构建一个 AttributeList 中含有的元素 AttributeList 其中它们由返回的指定，在顺序 AttributeList 的迭代器。所述 AttributeList 实例具有的的大小的110％的初始容量 AttributeList 指定。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AttributeList containing the elements of the List specified, in the order in which they are returned by the List's iterator.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 AttributeList ,其中包含指定 List 的元素，并按 List 的迭代器返回它们的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AudioFormat with a linear PCM encoding and the given parameters. The frame size is set to the number of bytes required to contain one sample from each channel, and the frame rate is set to the sample rate.
trans-unit.target: 构造带有线性PCM编码和给定参数的 AudioFormat 。帧大小设置为包含每个通道的一个样本所需的字节数，而帧速率设置为采样率。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AudioFormat with the given parameters. The encoding specifies the convention used to represent the data. The other parameters are further explained in the class description.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的参数构造一个 AudioFormat 。编码指定用于表示数据的约定。其他参数将在 class description 中进一步说明。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an BMPImageWriteParam object with default values for all parameters and a nullLocale.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 BMPImageWriteParam 对象，该对象具有所有参数的默认值和一个 null Locale 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an EOFException with null as its error detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 EOFException ，其错误详细信息为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an EOFException with the specified detail message. The string s may later be retrieved by the Throwable.getMessage() method of class java.lang.Throwable.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造 EOFException 。稍后可以通过类 java.lang.Throwable 的 Throwable.getMessage() 方法检索字符串 s 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo from the encryption algorithm name and the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 根据加密算法名称和加密数据构造一个 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo from the encryption algorithm parameters and the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 根据加密算法参数和加密数据构造一个 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an EnumConstantNotPresentException for the specified constant.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的常量构造一个 EnumConstantNotPresentException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ExceptionInInitializerError with null as its detail message string and with no saved throwable object. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 ExceptionInInitializerError ，其 null 为其详细信息消息字符串，并且不保存任何可抛出对象。详细消息是描述此特定异常的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ExecutionException with no detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细信息的 ExecutionException 。原因尚未初始化，并且随后可以通过调用 initCause 进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ExecutionException with the specified cause. The detail message is set to (cause == null ? null : cause.toString()) (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause).
trans-unit.target: 构造具有指定原因的 ExecutionException 。详细消息设置为 (cause == null ? null : cause.toString()) （通常包含 cause 的类和详细消息）。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ExecutionException with the specified detail message and cause.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息和原因构造一个 ExecutionException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ExecutionException with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 ExecutionException 。原因尚未初始化，并且随后可以通过调用 initCause 进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IIOByteBuffer that references a given byte array, offset, and length.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 IIOByteBuffer ，它引用给定的字节数组，偏移量和长度。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IIOException with a given message String and a Throwable that was its underlying cause.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的消息 String 和一个 Throwable 构造其 IIOException ，这是其根本原因。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IIOException with a given message String. No underlying cause is set; getCause will return null.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的消息 String 构造一个 IIOException 。未设置根本原因； getCause 将返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IIOImage containing a Raster, and thumbnails and metadata associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 IIOImage ,其中包含 Raster ，以及与其关联的缩略图和元数据。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IIOImage containing a RenderedImage, and thumbnails and metadata associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 IIOImage ,其中包含 RenderedImage 以及与其关联的缩略图和元数据。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IIOInvalidTreeException with a message string and a reference to the Node that caused the parsing error.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 IIOInvalidTreeException ，它带有消息字符串和对导致解析错误的 Node 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IIOInvalidTreeException with a message string, a reference to an exception that caused this exception, and a reference to the Node that caused the parsing error.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 IIOInvalidTreeException ，它带有消息字符串，对引起该异常的异常的引用以及对引起解析错误的 Node 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IIOMetadata object with the given format names and format class names, as well as a boolean indicating whether the standard format is supported.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的格式名称和格式类名称以及一个布尔值（指示是否支持标准格式）构造 IIOMetadata 对象。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IIOMetadataNode with a given node name.
trans-unit.target: 构造具有给定节点名称的 IIOMetadataNode 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IIOServiceProvider with a given vendor name and version identifier.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个具有给定供应商名称和版本标识符的 IIOServiceProvider 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IOException with null as its error detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 IOException ，将 null 作为其错误详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IOException with the specified cause and a detail message of (cause==null ? null : cause.toString()) (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause). This constructor is useful for IO exceptions that are little more than wrappers for other throwables.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 IOException ,它带有指定的cause和详细信息 (cause==null ? null : cause.toString()) （通常包含 cause 的类和详细信息）。此构造函数对IO异常有用，而IO异常只不过是其他throwable的包装器。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IOException with the specified detail message and cause.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息和原因构造一个 IOException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IOException with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造 IOException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalAccessError with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细消息的 IllegalAccessError 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalAccessError with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 IllegalAccessError 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalAccessException with a detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造带有详细消息的 IllegalAccessException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalAccessException without a detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细消息的 IllegalAccessException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalArgumentException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细消息的 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalArgumentException with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalClassFormatException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细消息的 IllegalClassFormatException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalClassFormatException with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 IllegalClassFormatException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalMonitorStateException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细消息的 IllegalMonitorStateException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalMonitorStateException with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细信息构造一个 IllegalMonitorStateException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalThreadStateException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细消息的 IllegalThreadStateException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IllegalThreadStateException with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 IllegalThreadStateException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageInputStreamImpl.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 ImageInputStreamImpl 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageInputStreamSpi with a given set of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的一组值构造一个 ImageInputStreamSpi 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageOutputStreamImpl.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 ImageOutputStreamImpl 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageOutputStreamSpi with a given set of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的一组值构造一个 ImageOutputStreamSpi 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageReadParam.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 ImageReadParam 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageReader and sets its originatingProvider field to the supplied value.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 ImageReader 并将其 originatingProvider 字段设置为提供的值。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageReaderSpi with a given set of values.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个具有给定值的 ImageReaderSpi 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageReaderWriterSpi with a given set of values.

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageTranscoderSpi with a given set of values.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的一组值构造一个 ImageTranscoderSpi 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageTypeSpecifier directly from a ColorModel and a SampleModel. It is the caller's responsibility to supply compatible parameters.
trans-unit.target: 直接从 ColorModel 和 SampleModel 构造一个 ImageTypeSpecifier 。提供兼容的参数是呼叫者的责任。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageTypeSpecifier from a RenderedImage. If a BufferedImage is being used, one of the factory methods createFromRenderedImage or createFromBufferedImageType should be used instead in order to get a more accurate result.
trans-unit.target: 从 RenderedImage 构造一个 ImageTypeSpecifier 。如果正在使用 BufferedImage ， createFromRenderedImage createFromBufferedImageType 工厂方法之一的createFromRenderedImage或createFromBufferedImageType以获得更准确的结果。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageWriteParam set to use a given Locale.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 ImageWriteParam 集以使用给定的 Locale 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageWriter and sets its originatingProvider instance variable to the supplied value.

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ImageWriterSpi with a given set of values.

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IncompatibleClassChangeError with no detail message.

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IncompatibleClassChangeError with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细信息构造一个 IncompatibleClassChangeError 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IndexOutOfBoundsException with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细信息构造一个 IndexOutOfBoundsException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InputMismatchException with null as its error message string.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 InputMismatchException ，其错误消息字符串为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InputMismatchException, saving a reference to the error message string s for later retrieval by the getMessage method.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 InputMismatchException ，保存对错误消息字符串 s 的引用，以供以后由 getMessage 方法检索。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InstantiationError with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造没有详细消息的 InstantiationError 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InstantiationError with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 InstantiationError 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InstantiationException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造没有详细消息的 InstantiationException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InstantiationException with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 InstantiationException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InternalError with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细消息的 InternalError 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InternalError with the specified cause and a detail message of (cause==null ? null : cause.toString()) (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 InternalError ,它带有指定的cause和详细信息 (cause==null ? null : cause.toString()) （通常包含 cause 的类和详细信息）。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InternalError with the specified detail message and cause.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息和原因构造一个 InternalError 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InternalError with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 InternalError 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InterruptedException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个没有详细消息的 InterruptedException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InterruptedException with the specified detail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 InterruptedException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InterruptedIOException with null as its error detail message.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 InterruptedIOException ，其错误详细信息为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InterruptedIOException with the specified detail message. The string s can be retrieved later by the Throwable.getMessage() method of class java.lang.Throwable.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息构造一个 InterruptedIOException 。稍后可以通过类 java.lang.Throwable 的 Throwable.getMessage() 方法检索字符串 s 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an IntrospectionException with a detailed message.
trans-unit.target: 构造带有详细消息的 IntrospectionException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an InvalidApplicationException with the specified Object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 Object 构造一个 InvalidApplicationException 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an OpenMBeanAttributeInfoSupport instance, which describes the attribute of an open MBean with the specified name, openType and description, and the specified read/write access properties.

trans-unit.target: 构造一个 OpenMBeanAttributeInfoSupport 实例，该实例描述具有指定 name ， openType ， description 和 defaultValue 以及指定的读取/写入访问属性的打开的MBean的属性。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an OpenMBeanAttributeInfoSupport instance, which describes the attribute of an open MBean with the specified name, openType, description, defaultValue and legalValues, and the specified read/write access properties.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 OpenMBeanAttributeInfoSupport 实例，该实例描述具有指定 name ， openType ， description ， defaultValue 和 legalValues 以及指定的读取/写入访问属性的打开的MBean的属性。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an OpenMBeanAttributeInfoSupport instance, which describes the attribute of an open MBean with the specified name, openType, description, read/write access properties, and Descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 OpenMBeanAttributeInfoSupport 实例，该实例描述具有指定 name ， openType ， description ，读取/写入访问属性和 Descriptor 的打开的MBean的属性。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an OpenMBeanAttributeInfoSupport instance, which describes the attribute of an open MBean, with the specified name, openType, description, defaultValue, minValue and maxValue. It is possible to specify minimal and maximal values only for an open type whose values are Comparable.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 OpenMBeanAttributeInfoSupport 实例，该实例描述了一种开放MBean的属性，与所述指定的 name ， openType ， description ， defaultValue ， minValue (最小值)和 maxValue 。只能为值是 Comparable 的开放类型指定最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.target: 构造一个 OpenMBeanConstructorInfoSupport 实例，该实例描述具有指定 name ， description 和 signature 的打开MBean类的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an OpenMBeanConstructorInfoSupport instance, which describes the constructor of a class of open MBeans with the specified name, description, signature, and descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 OpenMBeanConstructorInfoSupport 实例，该实例描述具有指定 name ， description ， signature 和 descriptor 的打开MBean类的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an OpenMBeanInfoSupport instance, which describes a class of open MBeans with the specified className, description, openAttributes, openConstructors , openOperations and notifications.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个 OpenMBeanInfoSupport 实例，该实例描述具有指定 className ， description ， openAttributes ， openConstructors ， openOperations 和 notifications 的打开MBean的类。

trans-unit.target: 构造一个 OpenMBeanOperationInfoSupport 实例，该实例描述具有指定 name ， description ， signature ， returnOpenType 和 impact 的打开的MBean类的操作。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an OpenMBeanParameterInfoSupport instance, which describes the parameter used in one or more operations or constructors of a class of open MBeans, with the specified name, openType, description, defaultValue, minValue and maxValue. trans-unit.source: Constructs an AttributedString instance with the given attributed text represented by AttributedCharacterIterator.

trans-unit.target: 用给定的文本和属性构造一个AttributedString实例。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AttributedString instance with the given text.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的文本构造一个AttributedString实例。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AttributedString instance with the subrange of the given attributed text represented by AttributedCharacterIterator. If the given range produces an empty text, all attributes will be discarded. Note that any attributes wrapped by an Annotation object are discarded for a subrange of the original attribute range.
trans-unit.target: 用AttributedCharacterIterator表示的给定属性文本的子范围构造一个AttributedString实例。如果给定的范围产生一个空文本,所有的属性将被丢弃。请注意,对于原始属性范围的子范围,任何由Annotation对象包装的属性都会被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an AttributedString instance with the subrange of the given attributed text represented by AttributedCharacterIterator. Only attributes that match the given attributes will be incorporated into the instance. If the given range produces an empty text, all attributes will be discarded. Note that any attributes wrapped by an Annotation object are discarded for a subrange of the original attribute range.
trans-unit.target: 用AttributedCharacterIterator代表给定的属性文本的子范围构造一个AttributedString实例。只有与给定属性相匹配的属性才会被纳入到实例中。如果给定的范围产生一个空文本,所有的属性将被丢弃。请注意,对于原始属性范围的子范围,任何由Annotation对象包装的属性都会被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an ExceptionInInitializerError with the specified detail message string. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception. The detail message string is saved for later retrieval by the Throwable.getMessage() method. There is no saved throwable object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的详细消息字符串构造ExceptionInInitializerError。详细消息是描述此特定异常的字符串。将保存详细消息字符串，以供以后通过 Throwable.getMessage() 方法检索。没有保存的可抛出对象。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an Rdn from the given rdn. The contents of the rdn are simply copied into the newly created Rdn.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的 rdn 构造一个Rdn 。 rdn 的内容仅被复制到新创建的Rdn中。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an Rdn from the given attribute set. See Attributes.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的属性集构造一个Rdn。请参阅 Attributes 。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an Rdn from the given attribute type and value. The string attribute values are not interpreted as RFC 2253 formatted RDN strings. That is, the values are used literally (not parsed) and assumed to be unescaped.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的属性类型和值构造一个Rdn。字符串属性值不解释为RFC 2253格式的RDN字符串。即，这些值将按字面使用（未解析）并假定为未转义。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an Rdn from the given string. This constructor takes a string formatted according to the rules defined in RFC 2253 and described in the class description for LdapName.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的字符串构造一个Rdn。此构造函数采用根据RFC 2253中定义的规则格式化的字符串，该字符串在 LdapName 的类描述中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: Constructs and returns a new SplittableRandom instance that shares no mutable state with this instance. However, with very high probability, the set of values collectively generated by the two objects has the same statistical properties as if the same quantity of values were generated by a single thread using a single SplittableRandom object. Either or both of the two objects may be further split using the split() method, and the same expected statistical properties apply to the entire set of generators constructed by such recursive splitting.
trans-unit.target: 构造并返回一个新的SplittableRandom实例，该实例与此实例不共享任何可变状态。但是，由两个对象共同生成的一组值具有很高的统计属性，就好像使用单个SplittableRandom对象由单个线程生成的数量相同的值一样。可以使用 split() 方法进一步拆分两个对象中的一个或两个，并且将相同的预期统计属性应用于通过这种递归拆分构造的整个生成器集。

trans-unit.source: Contains classes related to developing beans -- components based on the JavaBeans™ architecture.
trans-unit.target: 包含与开发bean有关的类-基于JavaBeans™体系结构的组件。

trans-unit.source: Contains classes related to developing beans -- components based on the JavaBeans™ architecture. A few of the classes are used by beans while they run in an application. For example, the event classes are used by beans that fire property and vetoable change events (see PropertyChangeEvent). However, most of the classes in this package are meant to be used by a bean editor (that is, a development environment for customizing and putting together beans to create an application). In particular, these classes help the bean editor create a user interface that the user can use to customize the bean. For example, a bean may contain a property of a special type that a bean editor may not know how to handle. By using the PropertyEditor interface, a bean developer can provide an editor for this special type.
trans-unit.target: 包含与开发bean有关的类-基于JavaBeans™体系结构的组件。 Bean在应用程序中运行时会使用其中的一些类。例如，触发属性和否决变更事件的bean使用事件类（请参见 PropertyChangeEvent ）。但是，此软件包中的大多数类都打算由Bean编辑器使用（即，用于自定义和组合Bean以创建应用程序的开发环境）。特别地，这些类帮助Bean编辑器创建一个用户界面，用户可以使用该界面来自定义Bean。例如，bean可能包含bean编辑器可能不知道如何处理的特殊类型的属性。通过使用 PropertyEditor 界面，bean开发人员可以为这种特殊类型提供编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Controllers 64 through 95 (0x40 - 0x5F) allow 7-bit precision. The value of a 7-bit controller is set completely by the value argument. An additional set of controllers provide 14-bit precision by using two controller numbers, one for the most significant 7 bits and another for the least significant 7 bits. Controller numbers 0 through 31 (0x00 - 0x1F) control the most significant 7 bits of 14-bit controllers; controller numbers 32 through 63 (0x20 - 0x3F) control the least significant 7 bits of these controllers. For example, controller number 7 (0x07) controls the upper 7 bits of the channel volume controller, and controller number 39 (0x27) controls the lower 7 bits. The value of a 14-bit controller is determined by the interaction of the two halves. When the most significant 7 bits of a controller are set (using controller numbers 0 through 31), the lower 7 bits are automatically set to 0. The corresponding controller number for the lower 7 bits may then be used to further modulate the controller value. It is possible that the underlying synthesizer does not support a specific controller message. In order to verify that a call to controlChange was successful, use getController.
trans-unit.target: 控制器64至95（0x40-0x5F）允许7位精度。7位控制器的 value 完全由该值设置论据。另一组控制器通过使用两个控制器编号来提供14位精度，一个控制器编号用于最高有效7位，而另一组控制器用于最低有效7位。控制器编号0到31（0x00-0x1F）控制14位控制器的最高7位。控制器编号32到63（0x20-0x3F）控制这些控制器的最低7位。例如，控制器编号7（0x07）控制通道音量控制器的高7位，而控制器编号39（0x27）控制低7位。 14位控制器的值由两个部分的相互作用确定。设置控制器的最高7位（使用控制器编号0到31）时，低7位将自动设置为0。然后可以使用低7位的相应控制器编号来进一步调制控制器值。底层合成器可能不支持特定的控制器消息。为了验证呼叫 controlChange 成功，请使用 getController 。

trans-unit.source: Controls
trans-unit.target: Controls

trans-unit.source: Controls that provide a choice between only two settings can often be implemented instead as a BooleanControl, and controls that provide a set of values along some quantifiable dimension might be implemented instead as a FloatControl with a coarse resolution. However, a key feature of EnumControl is that the returned values are arbitrary objects, rather than numerical or boolean values. This means that each returned object can provide further information. As an example, the settings of a REVERB control are instances of ReverbType that can be queried for the parameter values used for each setting.
trans-unit.target: 在两个设置之间进行选择的控件通常可以实现为 BooleanControl ，而在某个可量化维度上提供一组值的控件可以实现为具有 FloatControl 分辨率的FloatControl。但是， EnumControl 的一个关键功能是返回的值是任意对象，而不是数字或布尔值。这意味着每个返回的对象都可以提供更多信息。例如， REVERB 控件的设置是 ReverbType 的实例，可以查询用于每个设置的参数值。

trans-unit.source: Converting an instant to a zoned date-time is simple as there is only one valid offset for each instant. If the valid offset is different to the offset specified, then the date-time and offset of the zoned date-time will differ from those specified.
trans-unit.target: 将一个瞬间转换为区划日期-时间很简单,因为每个瞬间只有一个有效的偏移量。如果有效的偏移量与指定的偏移量不同,那么被分区的日期时间和偏移量将与指定的偏移量不同。

trans-unit.source: Converting between the two time-lines involves calculating the offset using the rules accessed from the ZoneId. Obtaining the offset for an instant is simple, as there is exactly one valid offset for each instant. By contrast, obtaining the offset for a local date-time is not straightforward. There are three cases:

trans-unit.source: Converts a URL of a specific protocol to a String.
trans-unit.target: 将特定协议的 URL 转换为 String 。

trans-unit.source: Converts a given path string to a Path and resolves it against this Path in exactly the manner specified by the resolve method. For example, suppose that the name separator is "/" and a path represents "foo/bar", then invoking this method with the path string "gus" will result in the Path "foo/bar/gus".
trans-unit.target: 将给定的路径字符串转换为 Path 并以 resolve 方法指定的确切方式针对此 Path 对其进行解析。例如，假设名称分隔符为“ / ”，并且路径表示“ foo/bar ”，那么使用路径字符串“ gus ” 调用此方法将得到 Path “ foo/bar/gus ”。

trans-unit.source: Converts a given path string to a Path and resolves it against this path's parent path in exactly the manner specified by the resolveSibling method.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的路径字符串转换为 Path ,并以 resolveSibling 方法指定的确切方式针对该路径的 parent 路径解析它。

trans-unit.source: Converts a path string, or a sequence of strings that when joined form a path string, to a Path. If more does not specify any elements then the value of the first parameter is the path string to convert. If more specifies one or more elements then each non-empty string, including first, is considered to be a sequence of name elements (see Path) and is joined to form a path string. The details as to how the Strings are joined is provider specific but typically they will be joined using the name-separator as the separator. For example, if the name separator is "/" and getPath("/foo","bar","gus") is invoked, then the path string "/foo/bar/gus" is converted to a Path. A Path representing an empty path is returned if first is the empty string and more does not contain any non-empty strings.
trans-unit.target: 将路径字符串或一系列字符串（在连接时形成路径字符串）转换为 Path 。如果 more 不指定任何元素，则 first 参数的值是要转换的路径字符串。如果 more 指定一个或多个元素，则将每个非空字符串（包括 first ）视为名称元素的序列（请参见 Path ），并将其连接起来以形成路径字符串。有关如何将字符串联接的详细信息是提供程序特定的，但通常将使用 name-separator 作为分隔符来联接它们。例如，如果名称分隔符为“ / ”且 getPath("/foo","bar","gus") 被调用，然后将路径字符串 "/foo/bar/gus" 转换为 Path 。一个 Path 如果返回代表空路径 first 是空字符串，并且 more 不包含任何非空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts all of the characters in this String to lower case using the rules of the default locale. This is equivalent to calling toLowerCase(Locale.getDefault()).
trans-unit.target: 使用默认语言环境的规则将此 String 中的所有字符转换为小写。这等效于调用 toLowerCase(Locale.getDefault()) 。

trans-unit.source: Converts all of the characters in this String to lower case using the rules of the given Locale. Case mapping is based on the Unicode Standard version specified by the Character class. Since case mappings are not always 1:1 char mappings, the resulting String may be a different length than the original String.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定 Locale 的规则将此 String 中的所有字符转换为小写。大小写映射基于 Character 类指定的Unicode标准版本。由于案例映射并不总是1：1字符映射，因此生成的 String 的长度可能与原始 String 的长度不同。

trans-unit.source: Converts all of the characters in this String to upper case using the rules of the default locale. This method is equivalent to toUpperCase(Locale.getDefault()).
trans-unit.target: 使用默认语言环境的规则将此 String 中的所有字符转换为大写。此方法等效于 toUpperCase(Locale.getDefault()) 。

trans-unit.source: Converts all of the characters in this String to upper case using the rules of the given Locale. Case mapping is based on the Unicode Standard version specified by the Character class. Since case mappings are not always 1:1 char mappings, the resulting String may be a different length than the original String.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定 Locale 的规则将此 String 中的所有字符转换为大写。大小写映射基于 Character 类指定的Unicode标准版本。由于案例映射并不总是1：1字符映射，因此生成的 String 的长度可能与原始 String 的长度不同。

trans-unit.source: Converts all primitive types to their corresponding wrapper types. Convenience method for methodType. All reference types (including wrapper types) will remain unchanged. A void return type is changed to the type java.lang.Void. The expression type.wrap().erase() produces the same value as type.generic().
trans-unit.target: 将所有原始类型转换为其对应的包装器类型。 methodType 的便捷方法。所有引用类型（包括包装器类型）将保持不变。将 void 返回类型更改为 java.lang.Void 类型。表达式 type.wrap().erase() 产生与 type.generic() 相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Converts all types, both reference and primitive, to Object. Convenience method for genericMethodType. The expression type.wrap().erase() produces the same value as type.generic().
trans-unit.target: 将所有引用和原始类型都转换为 Object 。 genericMethodType 的便捷方法。表达式 type.wrap().erase() 产生与 type.generic() 相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Converts all wrapper types to their corresponding primitive types. Convenience method for methodType. All primitive types (including void) will remain unchanged. A return type of java.lang.Void is changed to void.
trans-unit.target: 将所有包装器类型转换为其相应的原始类型。 methodType 的便捷方法。所有原始类型（包括 void ）将保持不变。 java.lang.Void 的返回类型已更改为 void 。

trans-unit.source: Converts an angle measured in degrees to an approximately equivalent angle measured in radians. The conversion from degrees to radians is generally inexact.
trans-unit.target: 将以度数测量的角度转换为以弧度测量的近似等效角度。从度到弧度的转换通常是不精确的。

trans-unit.source: Converts an angle measured in radians to an approximately equivalent angle measured in degrees. The conversion from radians to degrees is generally inexact; users should
trans-unit.target: 将以弧度测量的角度转换为以度数测量的近似角度。从弧度到度的转换通常是不精确的,用户应该

trans-unit.source: Converts an array of bytes into an instance of class Class, with an optional ProtectionDomain. If the domain is null, then a default domain will be assigned to the class as specified in the documentation for defineClass(String, byte[], int, int). Before the class can be used it must be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 使用可选的 ProtectionDomain 将字节数组转换为 Class 类的实例。如果domain为 null ，那么将按照文档中 defineClass(String, byte[], int, int) 指定为该类分配默认域。在使用该类之前，必须先对其进行解析。

trans-unit.source: Converts an array of bytes into an instance of class Class. Before the Class can be used it must be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 将字节数组转换为 Class 类的实例。在使用 Class 之前，必须先对其进行解析。

trans-unit.source: Converts an array of bytes into an instance of class Class. Before the Class can be used it must be resolved. This method is deprecated in favor of the version that takes a binary name as its first argument, and is more secure.
trans-unit.target: 将字节数组转换为 Class 类的实例。在使用 Class 之前，必须先对其进行解析。不建议使用此方法，而建议使用以二进制名称作为第一个参数的版本，并且此方法更安全。

trans-unit.source: Converts an array of bytes into an instance of class Class, with an optional CodeSource. Before the class can be used it must be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 将一个字节数组转换为Class的实例,并附带一个可选的CodeSource。在使用该类之前,必须对其进行解析。

trans-unit.source: Converts calendar field values to the time value (millisecond offset from the Epoch).
trans-unit.target: 将日历字段值转换为时间值（距Epoch的毫秒偏移量）。

trans-unit.source: Converts input data to a string.
trans-unit.target: 将输入数据转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the CollationKey to a sequence of bits. If two CollationKeys could be legitimately compared, then one could compare the byte arrays for each of those keys to obtain the same result. Byte arrays are organized most significant byte first.
trans-unit.target: 将CollationKey转换为一个比特序列。如果两个CollationKey可以合法地进行比较,那么我们可以比较每个键的字节数组来获得相同的结果。字节数组的组织方式是最重要的字节优先。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to a long by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to a long, the high-order 32 bits of the long are zero and the low-order 32 bits are equal to the bits of the integer argument. Consequently, zero and positive int values are mapped to a numerically equal long value and negative int values are mapped to a long value equal to the input plus 232.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 long 。在一个无符号转换为 long ，的高阶32位 long 是零和低32位等于整数参数的比特。因此，零和正 int 值被映射到一个数值上等于 long 值和阴性 int 值被映射到一个 long 值等于输入加2 32。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to a long by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to a long, the high-order 48 bits of the long are zero and the low-order 16 bits are equal to the bits of the short argument. Consequently, zero and positive short values are mapped to a numerically equal long value and negative short values are mapped to a long value equal to the input plus 216.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 long 。在一个无符号转换为 long ，的高阶48位 long 是零和低阶16个比特都等于的比特 short 参数。因此，零和正的 short 值被映射为数值相等的 long 值，负的 short 值被映射为等于输入加2 16的 long 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to a long by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to a long, the high-order 56 bits of the long are zero and the low-order 8 bits are equal to the bits of the byte argument. Consequently, zero and positive byte values are mapped to a numerically equal long value and negative byte values are mapped to a long value equal to the input plus 28.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 long 。在一个无符号转换为 long ，的高阶56位 long 是零和低位8位都等于的比特 byte 的参数。因此，零 byte 和正字节值映射为数值相等的 long 值，负 byte 值映射为等于输入加2 8的 long 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to an int by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to an int, the high-order 16 bits of the int are zero and the low-order 16 bits are equal to the bits of the short argument. Consequently, zero and positive short values are mapped to a numerically equal int value and negative short values are mapped to an int value equal to the input plus 216.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 int 。在无符号转换为一个 int ，所述的高阶16位 int 是零和低阶16个比特都等于的比特 short 参数。因此，零个和正的 short 值被映射为一个数值相等的 int 值，负的一个 short 值被映射为一个等于输入加2 16的 int 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the argument to an int by an unsigned conversion. In an unsigned conversion to an int, the high-order 24 bits of the int are zero and the low-order 8 bits are equal to the bits of the byte argument. Consequently, zero and positive byte values are mapped to a numerically equal int value and negative byte values are mapped to an int value equal to the input plus 28.
trans-unit.target: 通过无符号转换将参数转换为 int 。在无符号转换为一个 int ，所述的高阶24位 int 是零和低位8位都等于的比特 byte 的参数。因此，零 byte 和正字节值映射到一个数值相等的 int 值，负 byte 值映射到一个等于输入加2 8的 int 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the buffer's contents into a string by decoding the bytes using the named charset. The length of the new String is a function of the charset, and hence may not be equal to the length of the byte array.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用命名的 charset 解码字节，将缓冲区的内容转换为字符串。新 String 的长度是字符集的函数，因此可能不等于字节数组的长度。

trans-unit.source: Converts the buffer's contents into a string decoding bytes using the platform's default character set. The length of the new String is a function of the character set, and hence may not be equal to the size of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 使用平台的默认字符集将缓冲区的内容转换为解码字节的字符串。新 String 的长度是字符集的函数，因此可能不等于缓冲区的大小。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character (Unicode code point) argument to lowercase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息,将字符(Unicode码点)参数转换为小写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character (Unicode code point) argument to titlecase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file. If a character has no explicit titlecase mapping and is not itself a titlecase char according to UnicodeData, then the uppercase mapping is returned as an equivalent titlecase mapping. If the character argument is already a titlecase character, the same character value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息将字符(Unicode码点)参数转换为大小写。如果一个字符没有明确的大小写映射,而且根据UnicodeData,它本身不是一个大小写字符,那么大写映射将作为一个等价的大小写映射返回。如果字符参数已经是一个大小写字符,那么将返回相同的字符值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character (Unicode code point) argument to uppercase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file.
trans-unit.target: 利用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息,将字符(Unicode码点)参数转换为大写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character argument to lowercase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息将字符参数转换为小写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character argument to titlecase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file. If a character has no explicit titlecase mapping and is not itself a titlecase char according to UnicodeData, then the uppercase mapping is returned as an equivalent titlecase mapping. If the char argument is already a titlecase char, the same char value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息将字符参数转换为标题大写。如果字符没有显式的标题大小写映射，并且根据UnicodeData本身不是标题大小写字符，则将大写映射作为等效的标题大小写映射返回。如果 char 参数已经是一个标题用例 char ，则将返回相同的 char 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the character argument to uppercase using case mapping information from the UnicodeData file.
trans-unit.target: 使用UnicodeData文件中的大小写映射信息将字符参数转换为大写。

trans-unit.source: Converts the current calendar field values in fields[] to the millisecond time value time.
trans-unit.target: 将 fields[] 的当前日历字段值转换为毫秒时间值 time 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the current millisecond time value time to calendar field values in fields[]. This allows you to sync up the calendar field values with a new time that is set for the calendar. The time is not recomputed first; to recompute the time, then the fields, call the complete() method.
trans-unit.target: 将当前毫秒时间值 time 转换为 fields[] 日历字段值。这使您可以将日历字段值与为日历设置的新时间同步。不首先重新计算时间；要重新计算时间，然后重新计算字段，请调用 complete() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the double argument to a long using the doubleToLongBits method in class Double, and then writes that long value to the file as an eight-byte quantity, high byte first. The write starts at the current position of the file pointer.
trans-unit.target: 使用类 Double 中的 doubleToLongBits 方法将double参数转换为 long ，然后将该 long 值作为八字节数量写入文件，高字节在前。写入从文件指针的当前位置开始。

trans-unit.source: Converts the double argument to a long using the doubleToLongBits method in class Double, and then writes that long value to the underlying output stream as an 8-byte quantity, high byte first. If no exception is thrown, the counter written is incremented by 8.
trans-unit.target: 使用类 Double 中的 doubleToLongBits 方法将double参数转换为 long ，然后将该 long 值作为8字节的量写入高位字节的基础输出流。如果未引发异常，则 written 的计数器将增加 8 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the float argument to an int using the floatToIntBits method in class Float, and then writes that int value to the file as a four-byte quantity, high byte first. The write starts at the current position of the file pointer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Float 类中的 floatToIntBits 方法将float参数转换为 int ，然后将该 int 值以四字节的数量写入文件，高字节在前。写入从文件指针的当前位置开始。

trans-unit.source: Converts the float argument to an int using the floatToIntBits method in class Float, and then writes that int value to the underlying output stream as a 4-byte quantity, high byte first. If no exception is thrown, the counter written is incremented by 4.
trans-unit.target: 使用类 Float 中的 floatToIntBits 方法将float参数转换为 int ，然后将该 int 值作为4字节数量（高字节在前）写入基础输出流。如果未引发异常，则 written 的计数器将增加 4 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given baseName and locale to the bundle name. This method is called from the default implementation of the newBundle and needsReload methods.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的 baseName 和 locale 转换为包名称。从 newBundle 和 needsReload 方法的默认实现中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given bundleName to the form required by the ClassLoader.getResource method by replacing all occurrences of '.' in bundleName with '/' and appending a '.' and the given file suffix. For example, if bundleName is "foo.bar.MyResources_ja_JP" and suffix is "properties", then "foo/bar/MyResources_ja_JP.properties" is returned.
trans-unit.target: 通过替换所有出现的 '.' ，将给定的 bundleName 转换为 ClassLoader.getResource 方法所需的形式。在 bundleName 中带有 '/' 并附加 '.' 和给定的文件 suffix 。例如，如果 bundleName 为 "foo.bar.MyResources_ja_JP" ， suffix 为 "properties" ，则返回 "foo/bar/MyResources_ja_JP.properties" 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given URI to a Path object.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的URI转换为 Path 对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given time duration in the given unit to this unit. Conversions from finer to coarser granularities truncate, so lose precision. For example, converting 999 milliseconds to seconds results in 0. Conversions from coarser to finer granularities with arguments that would numerically overflow saturate to Long.MIN_VALUE if negative or Long.MAX_VALUE if positive.
trans-unit.target: 将以给定单位为单位的给定持续时间转换为此单位。从较细粒度到较粗粒度的转换会截断，因此会降低精度。例如，将 999 毫秒转换为秒将产生 0 。从较粗粒度到较细粒度的转换（带有数值溢出的参数，如果为负，则饱和为 Long.MIN_VALUE ,如果为正， Long.MAX_VALUE 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the object to a string. The string representation is the string "class" or "interface", followed by a space, and then by the fully qualified name of the class in the format returned by getName. If this Class object represents a primitive type, this method returns the name of the primitive type. If this Class object represents void this method returns "void".
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为字符串。字符串表示形式是字符串“ class”或“ interface”，后跟一个空格，然后是该类的完全限定名称，其格式为 getName 返回。如果此 Class 对象表示原始类型，则此方法返回原始类型的名称。如果此 Class 对象表示void，则此方法返回“ void”。

trans-unit.source: Converts the output to upper case according to the rules of the locale given during creation of the formatter argument of the formatTo() method. The output should be equivalent the following invocation of String.toUpperCase(java.util.Locale)
trans-unit.target: 根据在 formatTo() 方法的 formatter 参数创建过程中给定的语言环境规则，将输出转换为大写。输出应等效于 String.toUpperCase(java.util.Locale) 的以下调用

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified character (Unicode code point) to its UTF-16 representation stored in a char array. If the specified code point is a BMP (Basic Multilingual Plane or Plane 0) value, the resulting char array has the same value as codePoint. If the specified code point is a supplementary code point, the resulting char array has the corresponding surrogate pair.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的字符（Unicode代码点）转换为存储在 char 数组中的UTF-16表示形式。如果指定的代码点是BMP（基本多语言平面或平面0）值，则所得的 char 数组具有与 codePoint 相同的值。如果指定的代码点是辅助代码点，则所得的 char 数组具有相应的代理对。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified character (Unicode code point) to its UTF-16 representation. If the specified code point is a BMP (Basic Multilingual Plane or Plane 0) value, the same value is stored in dst[dstIndex], and 1 is returned. If the specified code point is a supplementary character, its surrogate values are stored in dst[dstIndex] (high-surrogate) and dst[dstIndex+1] (low-surrogate), and 2 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的字符（Unicode代码点）转换为其UTF-16表示形式。如果指定的代码点是BMP（基本多语言平面或平面0）值，则相同的值存储在 dst[dstIndex] ，并返回1。如果指定的代码点是补充字符，则其替代值存储在 dst[dstIndex] （高替代）和 dst[dstIndex+1] （低替代）中，并返回2。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified local date-time to the local date-time actually seen on a wall clock.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的本地日期-时间转换为挂钟上实际看到的本地日期-时间。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified surrogate pair to its supplementary code point value. This method does not validate the specified surrogate pair. The caller must validate it using isSurrogatePair if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的代理对转换为其补充代码点值。此方法不验证指定的代理对。如有必要，调用者必须使用 isSurrogatePair 对其进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Converts the time value (millisecond offset from the Epoch) to calendar field values. The time is not recomputed first; to recompute the time, then the fields, call the complete method.
trans-unit.target: 将时间值（从Epoch到毫秒的偏移量）转换为日历字段值。不首先重新计算时间；重新计算时间，然后在字段中调用 complete 方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts this BigDecimal to a BigInteger, checking for lost information. An exception is thrown if this BigDecimal has a nonzero fractional part.
trans-unit.target: 将此 BigDecimal 转换为 BigInteger ，以检查是否丢失了信息。如果此 BigDecimal 具有非零小数部分，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Converts this BigDecimal to a BigInteger. This conversion is analogous to the
trans-unit.target: 将此 BigDecimal 转换为 BigInteger 。此转换类似于

trans-unit.source: Converts this BigDecimal to a byte, checking for lost information. If this BigDecimal has a nonzero fractional part or is out of the possible range for a byte result then an ArithmeticException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将此 BigDecimal 转换为一个 byte ，检查丢失的信息。如果此 BigDecimal 具有非零小数部分或超出 byte 结果的可能范围，则将引发 ArithmeticException 。

trans-unit.source: Converts this BigDecimal to a double. This conversion is similar to the
trans-unit.target: 将此 BigDecimal 转换为 double 。此转换类似于

trans-unit.source: Converts this BigDecimal to a float. This conversion is similar to the
trans-unit.target: 将此 BigDecimal 转换为 float 。此转换类似于

trans-unit.source: Converts this BigDecimal to a long, checking for lost information. If this BigDecimal has a nonzero fractional part or is out of the possible range for a long result then an ArithmeticException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将此 BigDecimal 转换为 long ，以检查是否丢失了信息。如果此 BigDecimal 的分数部分非零或超出可能范围的 long 结果，则将引发 ArithmeticException 。

trans-unit.source: Converts this BigDecimal to a long. This conversion is analogous to the
trans-unit.target: 将此 BigDecimal 转换为 long 。此转换类似于

trans-unit.target: 将此 BigInteger 转换为 int ，以检查丢失的信息。如果此 BigInteger 的值超出 int 类型的范围，则抛出 ArithmeticException 。

trans-unit.source: Converts this IP address to a String. The string returned is of the form: hostname / literal IP address. If the host name is unresolved, no reverse name service lookup is performed. The hostname part will be represented by an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 将此IP地址转换为 String 。返回的字符串格式为：主机名/原义IP地址。如果主机名未解析，则不执行反向名称服务查找。主机名部分将由空字符串表示。

trans-unit.target: 将此抽象路径名转换为 file: URL。URL的确切形式取决于系统。如果可以确定此抽象路径名表示的文件是目录，则结果URL将以斜杠结尾。

trans-unit.target: 将此抽象路径名转换为路径名字符串。结果字符串使用 default name-separator character 来分隔名称序列中的名称。

trans-unit.source: CookieHandler
trans-unit.target: CookieHandler

trans-unit.source: CookieHandler is at the core of cookie management. User can call CookieHandler.setDefault to set a concrete CookieHanlder implementation to be used.
trans-unit.target: CookieHandler是cookie管理的核心。用户可以调用CookieHandler.setDefault来设置一个具体的CookieHanlder实现来使用。

trans-unit.source: CookieHandler.get()
trans-unit.target: CookieHandler.get()

trans-unit.source: CookieHandler.getDefault()
trans-unit.target: CookieHandler.getDefault()

trans-unit.source: CookieHandler.put()
trans-unit.target: CookieHandler.put()

trans-unit.source: CookieHandler.setDefault()
trans-unit.target: CookieHandler.setDefault()

trans-unit.source: CookieManager
trans-unit.target: CookieManager

trans-unit.source: CookieManager provides a concrete implementation of CookieHandler, which separates the storage of cookies from the policy surrounding accepting and rejecting cookies.
trans-unit.target: CookieManager提供了 CookieHandler 的具体实现，该实现将cookie的存储与围绕接受和拒绝cookie的策略分开。

trans-unit.source: CookieManager provides a concrete implementation of CookieHandler, which separates the storage of cookies from the policy surrounding accepting and rejecting cookies. A CookieManager is initialized with a CookieStore which manages storage, and a CookiePolicy object, which makes policy decisions on cookie acceptance/rejection.
trans-unit.target: CookieManager提供了 CookieHandler 的具体实现，该实现将cookie的存储与围绕接受和拒绝cookie的策略分开。那么CookieManager初始化为 CookieStore 负责管理存储和 CookiePolicy 对象，这使得上的cookie接受/拒绝决策。

trans-unit.source: CookieManager.get()
trans-unit.target: CookieManager.get()

trans-unit.source: CookieManager.getCookieStore()
trans-unit.target: CookieManager.getCookieStore()

trans-unit.source: CookieManager.put()
trans-unit.target: CookieManager.put()

trans-unit.source: CookieManager.setCookiePolicy()
trans-unit.target: CookieManager.setCookiePolicy()

trans-unit.source: CookiePolicy
trans-unit.target: CookiePolicy

trans-unit.source: CookiePolicy implementations decide which cookies should be accepted and which should be rejected.
trans-unit.target: CookiePolicy的实现决定了哪些Cookie应该被接受,哪些应该被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: CookiePolicy implementations decide which cookies should be accepted and which should be rejected. Three pre-defined policy implementations are provided, namely ACCEPT_ALL, ACCEPT_NONE and ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER.
trans-unit.target: CookiePolicy实现决定了哪些Cookie应该被接受,哪些应该被拒绝。我们提供了三个预定义的策略实现,即ACCEPT_ALL、ACCEPT_NONE和ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER。

trans-unit.source: CookiePolicy.shouldAccept will be called by CookieManager.put to see whether or not one cookie should be accepted and put into cookie store. User can use any of three pre-defined CookiePolicy, namely ACCEPT_ALL, ACCEPT_NONE and ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER, or user can define his own CookiePolicy implementation and tell CookieManager to use it.
trans-unit.target: CookiePolicy.shouldAccept将被CookieManager.put调用,以查看是否应该接受一个cookie并将其放入cookie存储中。用户可以使用三个预先定义的CookiePolicy中的任何一个,即ACCEPT_ALL、ACCEPT_NONE和ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER,或者用户可以定义自己的CookiePolicy实现并告诉CookieManager使用它。

trans-unit.source: CookiePolicy.shouldAccept()
trans-unit.target: CookiePolicy.shouldAccept()

trans-unit.source: CookieStore
trans-unit.target: CookieStore

trans-unit.source: CookieStore is the place where any accepted HTTP cookie is stored in. If not specified when created, a CookieManager instance will use an internal in-memory implementation. Or user can implements one and tell CookieManager to use it.
trans-unit.target: CookieStore是存储任何接受的HTTP cookie的地方。如果在创建时没有指定,CookieManager实例将使用一个内部的内存实现。或者用户可以实现一个,并告诉CookieManager使用它。
